These are standalone netbooks, for a sch: you could just remove them from the groups they shouldn't have access to, such as admin.
and what can they still do that you wish they can't?

don't make it so hard on yourself. Do not make the student user part of the admin group, remove the student user and recreate that user again. You can also use the clone packaging information and use that to set it all back to the way it was.
